howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: TokenArena revolutionizes the relationship between clubs and fans through an innovative blockchain platform.
howItWorks.step1Description: Clubs create exclusive tokens that represent benefits and experiences for fans.
howItWorks.step2Description: Fans acquire tokens to participate in votes, access exclusive content, and much more.
howItWorks.step3Description: Fans receive rewards for their loyalty and participation in the club's ecosystem.

clubBenefits.title: Benefits for Clubs
clubBenefits.description: Transform your relationship with fans and create new revenue streams.
clubBenefits.benefit1Description: Create new revenue streams through token sales and royalties on secondary transactions.
clubBenefits.benefit2Description: Increase fan engagement with exclusive votes and decisions for token holders.
clubBenefits.benefit3Description: Access valuable data about your most engaged fans and their preferences.

fanBenefits.title: Benefits for Fans
fanBenefits.description: Have a unique experience with your favorite club and be rewarded for your loyalty.
fanBenefits.benefit1Description: Participate in club decisions through exclusive votes for token holders.
fanBenefits.benefit2Description: Access exclusive experiences, such as meeting players and visiting the training center.
fanBenefits.benefit3Description: Receive rewards for your loyalty and participation in the club's ecosystem.
fanBenefits.benefit4Description: Your token can increase in value as the club's performance and popularity grow.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.subtitle: Get answers to your questions about our platform
faqSection.answer1: Fan Tokens are digital assets that represent participation rights and exclusive benefits for club fans.
faqSection.answer2: You can acquire Fan Tokens directly on the TokenArena platform using cryptocurrencies or credit card.
faqSection.question3: What benefits do Fan Tokens offer?
faqSection.answer3: Fan Tokens offer various benefits, such as participation in club votes, access to exclusive content, unique experiences, and rewards.
faqSection.answer4: No, Fan Tokens do not expire and can be transferred or sold at any time on the secondary market.
faqSection.question5: Is it safe to buy Fan Tokens?
faqSection.answer5: Yes, the TokenArena platform uses blockchain technology to ensure the security and transparency of all transactions.
